title: whats app photos - it seems to be all or nothing!
content:
I've just moved over from an iPhone and I've noticed that WhatsApp works slightly differently on the Pixel. 
I prefer to have the autosave turned off on WhatsApp so that the hundreds of photos that come through never make it into my photos folders. However, when I do receive an image I would like to save I used to tap and hold the image and save it. This doesn't seem to work on Pixel. Frustratingly the only way I can find to save photos sent by WhatsApp on Pixel is to have them ALL automatically saved. I then have to go through deleting hundreds that I don't want to keep. Very annoying. 
Am I missing an option here?
